concept_data.title: European Trade Union Institute for Research, Education and Health and Safety

summary: The "European Trade Union Institute for Research, Education and Health and Safety," commonly referred to as the "European Trade Union Institute," serves as a pivotal non-governmental organisation within the EU framework. It is dedicated to advancing research, education, and health and safety standards in the context of labor rights and trade union activities. The Institute provides essential resources and expertise to support trade unions in their advocacy for workers' rights and welfare. As a redirect to the preferred term, it highlights the Institute's integral role in shaping EU policies and regulations related to labor, thereby enhancing the overall effectiveness of trade union movements across member states.
